attributes.action: Do something about broadband its a disgrace i get 1mb nothing short of a scandal
attributes.background: I have never lived more than 40 miles from London so not rural yet at best I get a maximum of 1mb broadband, its a national disgrace, a scandal that BT/Openreach can get away with offering such a third world communications standard in the UK. Neither I nor my wife can work from home.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
